sub_topic: Determining the length of a side in an equilateral triangle.
message_1: An equilateral triangle has a perimeter of 60 cm. What is the length of each side?
message_2:
An equilateral triangle has three equal sides. To find the length of each side, we can simply divide the perimeter by the number of sides.

Perimeter = 60 cm
Number of sides = 3

Length of each side = Perimeter / Number of sides = 60 cm / 3 = 20 cm

Each side of the equilateral triangle is 20 cm long.
